articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspires Commanding Officers of KPA Combined Units
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspires Commanding Officers of KPA Combined Units
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, met the commanding officers of the combined units of the KPA and inspired them on the spot on April 1 after being told that they had successfully completed their study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Yun Tong Hyon, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol and Pak Jong Chon.
					
					 He acknowledged the cheers of the commanding officers and had a talk with them.
					
					 He was pleased to hear from them that they learned about the indomitable faith and will of the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners, while following their footsteps, and deeply grasped the ardent patriotism and revolutionary optimism with which they pictured the liberated country to themselves while sleeping on snow.
					
					 He highly praised them for having renewed through the study tour  their firm pledge to become commanding officers of O Jung Hup type who carry out the revolutionary duties given by the party like those of the anti-Japanese guerilla army, shouting the slogan "Forward, following me!" bearing deep in mind the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 He was present at the oath-taking meeting of the KPA commanding officers held in front of the statue of President Kim Il Sung of the Samjiyon Grand Monument. It was attended by the commanding officers of the combined units of the KPA who participated in the study tour.
					
					 He made a speech before its participants.
					
					 He said that, seeing the photos of tour-making commanding officers in sky-spirit every day, he felt as if he were joining them in the tour, adding he renewed his firm will to successfully implement the behests of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il by steadfastly carrying forward the Juche revolution started in Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 The commanding officers of the combined units might have experienced snowstorm in Mt. Paektu during the forced march, sleeping and eating outside just as the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters did, he noted, adding in this course they might have not only deeply grasped the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung who ate in the wind and slept in the dews to victoriously lead the great anti-Japanese war but known better about the origin  of our revolution and how its tradition was established.
					
					 He stressed that the study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in Mt. Paektu area was organized to raise a strong wind of education in the revolutionary traditions throughout the army to complete the Korean revolution in the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The party has very deep trust and great expectation for the commanding officers of the combined units, he said, stressing the need to dynamically wage the struggle to settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists with the arms of the revolution, arms of the working class, which originated from the stormy Mt. Paektu.
					
					 He indicated tasks and ways which would serve as guidelines for rounding off the combat preparations and bolstering up the fighting capabilities. 
					
					 There were speeches to evince their resolutions. 
					
					 The speakers renewed their firm determination to infuse into the service personnel the indomitable revolutionary spirit of the anti-Japanese fighters, who shouted the slogan for wiping out the enemy even if they died a hundred times, true to the noble intention of the supreme commander who called the young commanding officers to the battle sites of Mt. Paektu and to blow up all strongholds of the U.S. imperialist aggressors and other hostile forces once an order is issued. 
					
					 A letter to all the service personnel of the KPA was adopted at the meeting. 
					
					 On the same day Kim Jong Un had a photo session with the commanding officers of the combined units who took part in the study tour.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Moranbong Band
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Moranbong Band
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, enjoyed together with service personnel of the KPA a performance given by the Moranbong Band before its performance tour of Ryanggang Province. 
					 The presenter said in an excited tone: After giving the task to make the performance tour of Ryanggang Province, the supreme commander spared time to watch the performance though he was very busy with the work to protect the destiny of the country and its people from the arrogant and reckless moves of the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 He stressed the need to make rousing cheers for socialism and the WPK heard from the town at the foot of Mt. Paektu where the Korean revolution started. He gave the Moranbong Band an important instruction to powerfully encourage the people in Ryanggang Province in their struggle. 
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including female solo "O My Motherland Full of Hope", female duet and pangchang "Our Father", female solo and panchang "We Think of the Marshal Day and Night", violin solo and light music "Attraction and Reverence" and female quartet "We Know Nobody but You". 
					
					  The performers sang high praises of the exploits General Secretary Kim Jong Il performed by dedicating his all to realizing the ideals of the people and bringing happiness to them till the last moments of his life.
					
					 They enthusiastically sang songs emphasizing that the country would prosper forever as Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea under the leadership of Kim Jong Un who is  demonstrating the dignity and spirit of the great Paektusan nation before the whole world.
					
					 The performance was warmly acclaimed by the audience for the artistes' cheerful and dynamic voices, unique and enthusiastic instrumental music, perfect ensemble and beautiful melodies representing the spirit of the times.
					
					 Kim Jong Un waved back to the cheering performers and audience and congratulated the artistes on their successful performance.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Kim Myong Sik, Pak Thae Su, Kim Yong Chol, Jo Kyong Chol and Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Mongolian Minister of Industry and Agriculture
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Mongolian Minister of Industry and Agriculture
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a talk with Mongolian Minister of Industry and Agriculture Khaltmaa Battulga who is chairman of the Mongolian side to the Inter-governmental Committee for Consultation in Economy, Trade, Science and Technology between the DPRK and Mongolia, and his party who paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Mongolian Minister of Industry and Agriculture
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Mongolian Minister of Industry and Agriculture
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the visiting Mongolian Minister of Industry and Agriculture.
					 It was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by Minister of Industry and Agriculture Khaltmaa Battulga who is chairman of the Mongolian side to the Inter-governmental Committee for Consultation in Economy, Trade, Science and Technology between the DPRK and Mongolia, Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK, Mongolia Sign MOUs
articles.content:
DPRK, Mongolia Sign MOUs
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A memorandum of understanding on setting up the DPRK-Mongolia friendship joint company between the DPRK and Mongolian governments was inked here on Wednesday.
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade who doubles as chairman of the DPRK side to the Inter-governmental Committee for Consultation in Economy, Trade, Science and Technology between the DPRK and Mongolia, Hwang Min, vice-minister of Agriculture who is also chairman of the Livestock Management Committee in Sepho Area, and officials concerned and from the Mongolian side were Mongolian Minister of Industry and Agriculture Khaltmaa Battulga who is chairman of the Mongolian side to the Inter-governmental Committee for Consultation in Economy, Trade, Science and Technology between the DPRK and Mongolia and his party and Manibadrakh Ganbold, Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.
					
					 A MOU was also signed between the Ministry of Foreign Trade of the DPRK and the Ministry of Labor of Mongolia.

articles.title: Mongolian Guests Tour Pyongyang
articles.content:
Mongolian Guests Tour Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Mongolian Minister of Industry and Agriculture Khaltmaa Battulga who is chairman of the Mongolian side to the Inter-governmental Committee for Consultation in Economy, Trade, Science and Technology between the DPRK and Mongolia and his party visited the Tower of the Juche Idea.
					 The guests looked round the tower and the groups of sculptures, being briefed on the grand monument telling the ideological and theoretical exploits of President Kim Il Sung who founded the immortal Juche idea and indicated the way in the era of independence.
					
					 They commanded a bird's-eye view of Pyongyang on the balcony of the tower.
					
					 They also visited the Meari Shooting Gallery, etc.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Co-op Farms in South Hwanghae Province
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Co-op Farms in South Hwanghae Province
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the farming of co-operative farms in Yonan, Chongdan and Paechon counties in South Hwanghae Province.
					 Looking round the co-operative farms busy with the farming work, the premier encouraged the agricultural workers in their efforts for doing farm well. 
					
					 A consultative meeting took place on the spot. 
					
					 The meeting underlined the need to put agriculture on a steady high scientific and modern basis and positively introduce the advanced farming methods and thus attain the goal of grain production set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Discussed there were the issues to ensure that raw and other materials needed for the farming are supplied by the relevant units in good time.
					
					 Pak also went round the construction site of terminal 2 of Pyongyang Airport and took measures for ensuring quality and speed of the construction at a higher level.

articles.title: Enlarged Plenary Meeting of C.C., Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea Held
articles.content:
Enlarged Plenary Meeting of C.C., Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea Held
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- There took place here on Wednesday the 69th enlarged plenary meeting of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea.
					 It was attended by members and alternate members of the Central Committee of the union and its officials in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 The meeting discussed the tasks of the union organizations to implement the tasks set forth in "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive", a speech made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 A report of Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the union, was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that Kim Jong Un's speech is the immortal militant banner which indicates the ever-victorious way of the Korean revolution.
					
					 They said that the union has aroused all its members to fulfill their duty as agricultural workers in the era of Songun in the drive for defending socialism in the past period. This is the fruition of the energetic leadership of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, they added.
					
					 They raised tasks and ways arising in further consolidating the union organizations into the militant ranks of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Enlarged Plenary Meeting of C.C., Democratic Women's Union of Korea Held
articles.content:
Enlarged Plenary Meeting of C.C., Democratic Women's Union of Korea Held
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- There took place here on Wednesday the 68th enlarged plenary meeting of the C.C., the Democratic Women's Union of Korea.
					 It was attended by members and alternate members of the Central Committee of the union and its officials in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 The meeting discussed the tasks of the women's union organizations to implement the tasks set forth in "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive", a speech made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 A report of Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the union, was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that Kim Jong Un's speech is a cycle of the great theory of ideology of the Party which is carrying out the Korean revolution on the strength of ideology and single-minded unity by taking the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the Party's supreme programme.
					
					 They said that the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un led the women's union to fulfill its mission and duty as the organization for ideological education.
					
					 Referring to the great successes made in the work of the women's union, holding fast to the Juche-based theory of ideology, they raised the tasks and ways to effect a decisive turn in the ideological work.
					
					 They called upon all officials and members of the women's union to fulfill their responsibility and duty in the struggle to bring earlier the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche through the revolutionary ideological offensive.

articles.title: DPRK-Russia Friendship Meeting Held
articles.content:
DPRK-Russia Friendship Meeting Held
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A joint friendship meeting took place at DPRK-Russia Friendship Moranbong Secondary School No. 1 on Wednesday to mark the 65th anniversary of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 Present there were Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is also chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, officials concerned, teachers and students of the school, Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Prior to the meeting the guests went round the room dedicated to the history of the school and other rooms, being briefed on the school associated with the leadership exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 An art performance was given by Korean students and students of the embassy school.
					
					 Then followed colorful sports and amusement games.
					
					 The participants, divided into teams "friendship" and "unity", played a volleyball game, tug of war and other games.
					
					 They talked each other about the development of the cooperation in several fields between the two countries.

articles.title: Spring Tree-Planting Event Held by RCSK Young Members
articles.content:
Spring Tree-Planting Event Held by RCSK Young Members 
 Unsan, April 2 (KCNA) -- A spring tree-planting event was held by young members of the Red Cross Society of Korea in Unsan County, South Phyongan Province, on Wednesday on the occasion of the spring period of the general mobilization for land management.
					 Present at the event were officials and members of the Red Cross Society of Korea (RCSK), volunteers, officials concerned, members of the delegations of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the International Committee of the Red Cross active in the DPRK, foreign diplomatic envoys here and members of the Pyongyang International Women's Association.
					
					 Speeches were made at the event.
					
					 Speakers said that the young people play a very important role in turning the whole country into a thick woodland and greenery, noting that the tree-planting through the agro-forestry management method is an advantageous method that should be positively introduced in preventing disasters and improving the people's living standard.  
					
					 They stressed the need to create many more forests and take good care of them in order to improve ecological environment and ensure the human's activities for existence, adding it is very essential for the future of the globe.
					
					 The participants planted three-leave pine trees, talking with each other about the technical issues arising in planting many more trees of good species and tending them.
					
					 The spring tree-planting of RCSK young members will continue till April 13 in South and North Phyongan and South Hamgyong provinces and other parts of the country.

articles.title: Seriously Burnt Woman Completely Cured
articles.content:
Seriously Burnt Woman Completely Cured
 Kaesong, April 2 (KCNA) -- A seriously burnt girl worker was cured completely in 100-odd days, thanks to the sincere efforts of the medical workers of the Kaesong City People's Hospital and other people. 
					 When she was carried to the hospital in late November last year, her life was in a critical condition after getting third-degree burns on 50 percent of her body.
					
					 Medical workers succeeded in helping the patient recover her senses, removed her burns inflammation and rounded off the preparations for skin grafting 20-odd days later.
					
					 More than people from all walks of life in the city including officials and employees of the hospital, people's security workers, youth and students donated their blood and flesh for skin-grafting operations.
					
					 Even after the skin-grafting operations the patient fell into a critical state several times. But, she could recover her health thanks to all sincerities of the medical workers of the hospital and people of the present era.
					
					 Leaving for her worksite, Ryu Jong Ae said that during the 100-odd days of her hospitalization she has experienced the true picture of our society.

articles.title: Sports Games of Workers in Field of Public Health Opens
articles.content:
Sports Games of Workers in Field of Public Health Opens
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The 2nd sports games of workers in the field of public health was opened at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Wednesday.
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier, officials concerned and officials, workers and players in the field of public health.
					
					 Minister of Public Health Kang Ha Guk said in his speech made at an opening ceremony that supreme leader Kim Jong Un watched the sports games of workers in the field of public health in May last year, instilling faith in certain victory and optimism into them and showing warm loving care.
					
					 He called on all players to fully display high sports technique which they trained during mass sports activities as well as a high sense of solidarity and noble spiritual and moral traits in all games.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, there took place men's and women's volleyball matches.
					
					 The games will go on until May 1. The participants will compete in various games including basketball, volleyball, table-tennis, tug of a war, Ssrium, track-and-field and group running at the stadium and other places.

articles.title: Children's Paduk Contest Held
articles.content:
Children's Paduk Contest Held 
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The 14th Pyongyang Spring Children's Paduk (go) Contest took place under the sponsorship of the Pyongyang Paduk Centre in the DPRK some days ago.
					 The contest, divided into kindergarten and primary school groups, was attended by more than 70 kindergarteners and primary schoolchildren of the first and second grades.
					
					 Yun Yong Myong, director of the Pyongyang Paduk Centre, told KCNA:
					
					 The number of attendants has increased remarkably in the 14th contest.
					
					 In the primary school group, Ji Kwang Ung from Songuja Primary School in Mangyongdae District came first in the male's individual event and Kim Hyon Gyong from Phalgol Primary School in Mangyongdae District in the female's individual event. 
					
					 In the kindergarten group, Pak Tu Il from Soryong Kindergarten No. 1 in Taedonggang District placed first in the male's individual event and Sim Ji Hong from Munsu Kindergarten No. 1 in Taedonggang District in the female's individual event.
					
					 Munsu Kindergarten No. 1 in Taedonggang District and Sinwon Kindergarten in Pothonggang District topped the list in the team event.

articles.title: Brisk Agitation Activities in DPRK
articles.content:
Brisk Agitation Activities in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Small groups of artistes of national art troupes are conducting brisk agitation activities for increased production at various fields of the national economy, major construction sites and co-op farms.
					 Artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe and the National Theatrical Troupe conducted the frontline-style agitation activities at the construction sites of the power stations in tiers along the Chongchon River, Sunchon Cement Complex, Anju Area Coal Mining Complex, etc.
					
					 Artistes of the National Folk Art Troupe visited the Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, and cooperative farms in Jaeryong, Chongdan, Yonan and Paechon counties of South Hwanghae Province for agitation for increased production.
					
					 Those of the National Circus presented colorful acrobatic numbers at cooperative farms of South and North Hwanghae provinces to be acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 Their agitation activities are greatly encouraging working people out to build a thriving nation.

articles.title: Farm Work Done in Scientific Way in Chongsan-ri
articles.content:
Farm Work Done in Scientific Way in Chongsan-ri
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Chongsan Co-op Farm in Kangso District, Nampho City in the DPRK is planning to introduce advanced methods to this year's farming.
					 The farm completed feasible plan for this year's farming to introduce advanced farming technology and cultivation technology in raising rice seedlings.
					
					 Kim Yong Sik, chief engineer of farm, told KCNA:
					
					 The farm decided to introduce humus-pot seedlings, rapid-growing seedlings and granulated nutritive seedlings to all its arable land on the basis of the farm's experience and technical foundations.
					
					 Farming by granulated nutritive seedlings is one of advanced farming methods as it needs the area of rice-seedling 10 times smaller than before, thus saving a large quantity of vinyl sheets, seeds, fertilizer and workforce.
					
					 On the basis of scientific soil analysis, the farm plans to introduce the high-yield species of seeds to 70 percent of the farm's cultivated area.
					
					 All the employees of the farm are striving to acquire a wide range of advanced farming technologies.
					
					 The farm also plans to introduce mud-snail organic farming in an intensive way.

articles.title: Kangso Knitwear Factory Taking Lead in Technical Innovations
articles.content:
Kangso Knitwear Factory Taking Lead in Technical Innovations
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Kangso Knitwear Factory in the DPRK has paid big efforts to improving quality of products.
					 The factory has pressed ahead with updating production process on its own efforts.
					
					 Technicians and engineers of the factory have succeeded in making a CNC heat-treatment machine, equipped with automatic temperature sensor.
					
					 The invention of liquid-cyclic tinting machine makes it possible to cut the dyeing hours four times shorter than before, while ensuring high quality.
					
					 More than 20 technical innovations have been introduced to production in recent two years alone.
					
					 Scores of kinds of underwear and sportswear produced by the factory are put on sale at Pyongyang Department Store No. 1, enjoying popularity.
					
					 Choe Chun Son, manager of the factory, told KCNA:
					
					 The factory has put spurs to updating production processes while boosting production. It has also paid deep attention to improving the employees' livelihood.

articles.title: DPRK People Urge Shower of Shells on S. Korean Provokers
articles.content:
DPRK People Urge Shower of Shells on S. Korean Provokers
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Citizens in the DPRK are now hardening their will to shower fire of revenge on the south Korean military hooligans for their cruel atrocities.
					 The gangsters recently seized a fishing boat of the DPRK in its territorial waters in the West Sea of Korea and forced "defection" on its sailors by use of guns, iron bars and hooks.
					
					 Such rude atrocities against humanity lashed the DPRK people into a great fury all at once.
					
					 Choe Song Jin, a writer of the C.C., Writers Union of Korea, told KCNA:
					
					 They are undoubtedly not Koreans but loonies. 
					
					 The pirates intruded into our territorial waters under the screen of night to seize the boat and commit outrages on its crewmen. Nevertheless, they have the impudence to assert that the case was a "step taken for the safety of sailors" in bad sea conditions and the sailors were sent back home in view of "humanitarianism". Then, how can we regard them as in normal state of thinking?
					
					 The recent case fully revealed the true colors of the Park Geun Hye group that would pull up others over the "human rights" issue.
					
					 The group of pirates keen on cruelty should be wiped out to the last one with shower of shells.
					
					 Kim Hyok Hwan, a department director of the C.C., Red Cross Society of Korea, said:
					
					 The recent deeds of the south Korean military gangsters are a heinous crime against humanity without parallel in the world.
					
					 In the past the DPRK warmly treated with brotherly love south Korean sailors who illegally intruded into its territorial waters, and sent them back in view of compatriotism and humanitarianism.
					
					 But the south Korean military gangsters are talking about someone's "human rights" and "ethics" though they committed such hideous crimes hard to image. This is the height of impudence and they are just the cruelest abusers of human rights and immoral savages.
					
					 It is a mockery and insult to the noble spirit of the Red Cross for those villains to talk about compatriotism and humanitarianism.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should severely punish the ringleaders of the case and all those involved in it. If not, the DPRK army and people's revenge will burst forth like an erupting volcano to turn the dens of criminals into a sea of flames.

articles.title: DPRK Fishermen Call for Severe Punishment of Pirates
articles.content:
DPRK Fishermen Call for Severe Punishment of Pirates
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Officials and workers in the fishery field of the DPRK have strongly urged a harsh punishment of the south Korean navy gangsters who committed outrages on defenseless crewmen of the DPRK on its territorial waters in the West Sea.
					 Ri Yong Chol, chief engineer of the Marine Transport Management Bureau under the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport, told KCNA:
					
					 The atrocities of the south Korean gangsters are tantamount to piracy that can never be pardoned in view of international norms.
					
					 The world has seen precedents that distressed crewmen were rescued on sea and offered necessary convenience, but no such instance as the fact that the south Korean gangsters fired at a peaceable fishing boat and beat its crewmen into coma with murder weapons, forcing defection on them.
					
					 The south Korean military has perhaps gone mad. As a proverb says that a club is fit for a mad dog, all the pirates on Paekryong Island, a den of evils, should be beaten to death.
					
					 Choe Kyong Ju, a fleet chief at the Kamapho Fishing Station, said:
					
					 Fishermen and all other employees of the station are hardening their will to annihilate the provokers.
					
					 By nature, nothing is more precious than morals to sailors who are always on sea. But the south Korean navy gangsters attacked with arms our peaceable fishing boat in distress and even abducted its crewmen by use of iron bars. How can we pardon such villains?
					
					 Those unethical gangsters should be buried at sea in time without mercy.
					
					 Rim Chol, a department director of the Ministry of Fisheries, said:
					
					 It will be hard to see peaceful sea if the group of pirates without human ethics are allowed to go free.
					
					 The pirates' atrocities are ascribable to egis of Park Geun Hye keen on anti-DPRK confrontation moves. She instigated her hirelings to go about anti-DPRK piracy while traveling abroad with such rhetoric as "unification era".
					
					 What is urgently needed is to give a decisive punishment to Park and the south Korean military gangsters.

articles.title: Quake Hits S. Korea
articles.content:
Quake Hits S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- An earthquake which reached a magnitude of 5.1 on the Richter scale occurred with ensuing aftershocks in the waters 100 km northwest of Kyokryolbi Islands of Thaean County, South Chungchong Province at dawn on April 1, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 The tremor was reportedly felt even in Seoul and Kyonggi Province.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated by Koreans in Uzbekistan
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan held a photo exhibition at the building of the association on March 30 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos of Kim Il Sung receiving overseas Koreans and those of General Secretary Kim Jong Il signing the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 Also displayed were photos of Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un inspecting units of the Korean People's Army and giving on-the-spot guidance to various units of the economic sectors.
					
					 Photos showing the development of the DPRK were also displayed.
					
					 Present at the exhibition were Chairman Ju Yong Il and Vice-Chairman Ko Tae Chun of the association, the editor-in-chief of the paper Thongil, heads of art troupes of Koreans and compatriots.
					
					 Ju Yong Il said in his speech that the Day of the Sun is a common holiday of not only the Korean people but also overseas compatriots and progressive mankind of the world.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The exhibition offered us an opportunity to recollect again the immortal feats the President performed by devoting himself to Korea's liberation, socialist construction and the cause of achieving the country's reunification.
					
					 The immortal feats he performed on behalf of the country and the people, the era and the revolution and his noble popular traits are being cherished deeper in the minds of compatriots day by day.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is invariably and confidently leading the DPRK to the road of independence, Songun and socialism by carrying forward the idea and cause of the President.
					
					 He called upon compatriots to turn out as one in the work for the country's reunification and prosperity under the banner of the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 The participants looked round the venue of the photo exhibition.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Nakhodka, Russia on Mar. 26.
					  Zelenov, first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize diverse political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Romania, Guinea
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Romania, Guinea 
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held in Romania and a film show in Guinea in celebration of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) on Mar. 24 and 25.
					 Displayed at the venue of the seminar were works of the President and books introducing the Korean people building an economic power.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said:
					
					 The President embarked on the road of revolution in his early years, founded the Juche idea which clarifies that man is the master of everything and decides everything and led the arduous anti-Japanese war to a victory, thus accomplishing the historic cause of liberating the country.
					
					  Thanks to his outstanding military stratagem and tactics the heroic Korean people created such a miracle of history as defeating the imperialist allied forces in the three-year war ignited by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 He put forward socialist theories on settling the issues arising in every period and at each stage of the revolution and construction on the basis of the Juche-oriented principles and thus clearly indicated the way to be followed by not only the Korean revolution but the global socialist movement.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, the great leader and great man was, indeed, the benevolent father of the Korean nation who devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 Therefore, the Day of the Sun is not only the greatest holiday of the Korean nation but a common holiday of progressive humankind.
					
					 Screened at the film show in Guinea was the Korean film "Pyongyang Today".
					
					 Speakers praised the President for his exploits for the socialist cause and the cause of anti-imperialist independence in the 20th century.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked by Organization of DR Congo
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked by Organization of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the DR Congo for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung issued a bulletin "April 15, 2014, 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung" on Mar. 26.
					 The bulletin carried articles titled "Founder of Juche idea and Songun idea", "Iron-willed commander" and "Believing in people as in Heaven".
					
					 The bulletin said:
					
					 The President fathered the Juche idea and the Songun idea and thoroughly applied them in the whole period of the protracted revolutionary struggle.
					
					 The Juche idea and the Songun idea are the great programmes and encyclopedic ideas guaranteeing the victorious advance of the human cause of independence.
					
					 The President was an invincible and iron-willed commander who led the two revolutionary wars to victory and ushered in a new era of the national liberation struggle in colonies, working miracles of history.
					
					 He always found himself among the people, lent his ears to their voices and reflected their demand and desire in shaping policies.
					
					 He, who devoted his whole life to the people, is always remembered by the Korean people and progressive humankind as the tender-hearted father of the people.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un identical to the President is enjoying the absolute support and trust from all Koreans for his great political caliber, deep love for the people and great devotion.
					
					 Victory and glory are in store for the Korean people holding in high esteem Kim Jong Un, another distinguished leader.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Denounce S. Korean Military's Provocation against DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Denounce S. Korean Military's Provocation against DPRK 
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on March 26 in denunciation of the south Korean military's anti-DPRK provocation. 
					 Referring to the fact that the south Korean military fired guns in the area of five islands in the West Sea of Korea and scattered leaflets slandering the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system, the statement went on:
					
					 Such reckless acts of the pro-U.S. south Korean puppet military are driving the inter-Korean relations to an irreversible catastrophe. 
					
					 It is an unpardonable and treacherous act to slander the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system. 
					
					 The criminal acts of the south Korean military are leading the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe and laying obstacles to ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 The south Korean chief executive let loose such hypocritical words as "confidence" and "unification" in the international arena, but they are nothing but ridiculous propaganda. 
					
					 "Unification" touted by her means "unification" under the reactionary and unpopular system of south Korea. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will resolutely and mercilessly deal a sledge-hammer blow at such provocation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Exploits Introduced by German Institute
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Exploits Introduced by German Institute
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The MS Travel Company of Germany posed on its website on March 24 an article titled "Masikryong Ski Resort" introducing exploits of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, accompanied with photos of the resort. 
					 The article said:
					
					 A world-level ski resort has been built on Masik Pass in the DPRK, drawing great attention of the international community. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un personally initiated the construction of the ski resort and published an appeal "Let Us Usher in a Fresh Heyday on All the Fronts of Socialist Construction by Creating the 'Speed on Masik Pass'". 
					
					 He visited the rugged construction site several times to take measures for finishing the project at the shortest time. He saw to it that the resort was built perfectly on the principle of ensuring security and convenience, suited to the characters of the area. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un possessed of noble traits of loving the people went round the completed ski resort, setting forth the task to build more lodgings and service facilities so that school youth and children across the country may enjoy winter camping while skiing, skating and sledging at the resort.

articles.title: British Organizations Criticize U.S.-S. Korea Military Exercises
articles.content:
British Organizations Criticize U.S.-S. Korea Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a joint statement on Mar. 13 in denunciation of the large-scale joint military exercises for aggression kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and south Korea. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula is being driven into an extreme pitch of strain owing to the ceaseless war exercises of the U.S. imperialists. 
					
					 Recently U.S. Secretary of State Kerry and former U.S. President Bush malignantly slandered the DPRK, a socialist country centered on the popular masses. 
					
					 This proves once again that the U.S. has no intention to recognize the independent right of the DPRK and its socialist system. 
					
					 Now the DPRK is taking positive measures to defuse tensions and create a peaceful circumstance. 
					
					 The respected H.E. Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address clarified the realistic ways for opening a new historic turning point for Korea's reunification. 
					
					 The National Defence Commission of the DPRK sent a crucial proposal and open letter to south Korea. 
					
					 However, the U.S. imperialists and south Korean authorities kicked off the large-scale joint military exercises targeted at the DPRK. 
					
					 We demand the U.S. and south Korean authorities stop at once the large-scale joint military exercises and behave themselves.

articles.title: Japanese Denounces U.S.-S. Korea War Maneuvers
articles.content:
Japanese Denounces U.S.-S. Korea War Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Takashi Nada, representative of the Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan, made public a statement on March 14 in denunciation of the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The world hopes that exchange and cooperation between the north and the south will be promoted on the Korean peninsula and its independent and peaceful reunification will be achieved as early as possible. 
					
					 But the U.S. is resorting to such vicious moves as setting the Korean nation at variance, turning its back on such trend of the world. 
					
					 The most typical expression is the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills staged in south Korea and its vicinity every year. 
					
					 Those drills are offensive ones for invading the DPRK, not "defensive ones" as touted by the U.S. and south Korean authorities. 
					
					 The National Defence Commission of the DPRK on January 23 in an open letter to the south Korean authorities, political parties, public organizations and people from all walks of life demanded an immediate stop to the war maneuvers for aggression to be staged with outside forces. 
					
					 Thanks to the DPRK's patient efforts, reunions of separated families and relatives were made in Mt. Kumgang resort. 
					
					 But the U.S. and south Korean authorities finally kicked off the joint military drills on February 24. 
					
					 We bitterly protest against the war drills of the U.S. and south Korean authorities against the DPRK and call upon peace-loving progressives to denounce them. 
					
					 Once again we demand the U.S. stop at once the ongoing provocative war drills against the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Mexican Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Mexican Paper
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive" was carried by Mexican paper Unidad Nacional on Mar. 15.
					 The work is a speech made by Kim Jong Un at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea on Feb. 25, Juche 103 (2014).
					
					 The speech clarifies that the whole course of the Korean revolution can be called a history of ideological campaign to give full play to the might of the truth of the revolutionary ideology of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also indicates tasks facing the field of the party ideological work at present and ways of carrying them out. 
					
					 The paper carried a photo of Kim Jong Un addressing at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Kuwaiti Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Kuwaiti Figure
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Yousef Al Amiri, chairman of the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association and president of the Kuwait House of Works, issued a statement on Mar. 23. He is also the chairman of the Kuwaiti preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The august name of President Kim Il Sung is well known to the Arab people, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 He sent material aid and moral support to the Arab people in their just struggle for taking back the sovereignty. He forged excellent relationship with the leaders of Arab countries and helped the Arab people build a new society against colonialism.
					
					 All of us pay respect to the great and kind-hearted President, wishing for his eternal life on the occasion of his 102nd birth anniversary.
					
					 Our visits to the DPRK in the past helped us realize the profound respect of the Korean people for the President.
					
					 The cause of the preceding leaders is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un in the DPRK which is vibrant with youthful vigor.
					
					 We are sure that the DPRK will emerge as a peaceful and reunified country in the near future under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, who loves justice and peace and values the people most.
					
					 We will always stand by the Korean people in their struggle to defend peace and security, improve the north-south relations and promote the living standard of the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se reune con comandantes de unidades combinadas de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se reune con comandantes de unidades combinadas de EPC
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se reunio el dia primero en el terreno con los comandantes de las unidades combinadas del EPC y estimulo a ellos, tras recibir el parte de que se culmino con exito el recorrido por los lugares de batalla revolucionaria de la zona del monte Paektu.
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Yun Tong Hyon, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol y Pak Jong Chon.
					
					El Mariscal respondio a las aclamaciones y departio con los comandantes.
					
					Escucho satisfecho sus palabras de que siguiendo las huellas de los martires revolucionarios antijaponeses asimilaron la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de esos combatientes y comprendieron el patriotismo y optimismo revolucionario de los combatientes quienes echaban de menos de la patria liberada aunque dormian sobre nieve.
					
					Evaluo altamente que a traves del recorrido los comandantes de las unidades combinadas del EPC hayan tomado la ferrea fe de ser comandantes de tipo O Jung Hup que cumplieron hasta el final las misiones revolucionarias dadas por el partido al guardar en el corazon el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu y gritar como los comandantes de la guerrilla antijaponesa la orden "!Sigueme!".
					
					Seguidamente, el Mariscal tomo parte en el acto de juramento de los comandantes efectuado en el patio de educacion frente a la estatua de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung  levantada al lado  del Conjunto Monumental de Samjiyon.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion los  comandantes participantes en el recorrido.
					
					El Mariscal pronuncio un discurso ante los participantes en el acto.
					
					Dijo que viendo diariamente las fotos de los comandantes participantes en la marcha de exploracion el mismo se ardio del mismo sentimiento de los exploradores. Anadio que redoblo la voluntad de continuar firmemente el camino de la revolucion del Juche iniciado en el Paektu y llevar a feliz termino los legados de los Generalisimos.
					
					Estoy seguro de que los comandantes hayan probado las ventiscas del monte Paektu realizando la marcha forzada y acampanando en el aire libre, subrayo y continuo que en ese proceso tambien hayan asimilado en el corazon las inmortales hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien llevo su vida a la intemperie para conducir a la victoria la gran batalla antijaponesa y conocido bien como se prepararon el origen y la tradicion de la revolucion coreana.
					
					Organice este recorrido para avivar en todo el ejercito el fervor por la educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias y completar hasta el fin con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu la revolucion coreana, acoto.
					
					Anadio que son muy grandes la confianza y la esperanza del partido en los comandantes de las unidades combinadas y destaco la necesidad de desplegar la lucha violenta por saldar cuenta total con el imperio yanqui al tomar mas firmemente los fusiles de la revolucion y de clases, consolidados en el monte Paektu.
					
					Presento las tareas y los remedios que serviran de guia programatica para perfeccionar los preparativos de combate e intensificar la combatividad de todo el ejercito.
					
					Hubo las intervenciones de juramento.
					
					Los oradores juraron infundir en el corazon de los militares el indoblegable espiritu revolucionario de los combatientes antijaponeses de combatir contra los enemigos aunque mueren cien veces en fiel acato al noble proposito del Comandante Supremo quien llamo a los lugares de batalla del monte Paektu a los jovenes oficiales de la nueva epoca, y aniquilar a todos los nidos de los agresores yanquis y a las fuerza hostiles cuando se de la orden.
					
					En la ocasion se adopto una carta dirigida a todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC.
					
					Este dia, el Mariscal tomo foto de recuerdo junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC participantes en el recorrido.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Banda Moranbong junto con oficiales y soldados de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Banda Moranbong junto con oficiales y soldados de EPC
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC, presencio la funcion de la Banda Moranbong que esta en visperas de su gira por la provincia de Ryanggang.
					La presentadora dijo en tono emocionante que el Mariscal, quien dio a la banda Moranbong la tarea de realizar la funcion en la provincia de Ryanggang, vino aqui para ver su funcion en visperas de su gira aun siendo tan atareado por defender el destino de la patria y el pueblo frustrando las imprudentes tentativas de los imperialistas yanquis y otras fuerzas hostiles tendentes a aplastar a la RPDC.
					
					Destaco que el dio la valiosa instruccion de que la banda estimule con mas vigor la lucha de los habitantes de la Ryanggang diciendo que hay que hacer que desde el primer poblado al pie del monte Paektu donde se inicio la revolucion coreana se repercuta el vitor al socialismo y al PTC.
					
					En la escena se presentaron variadas piezas tales como el solo femenino "Mi patria llena de esperanzas", el duo femenino y pangchang "Nuestro padre", el solo femenino y pangchang "Siempre pensamos en el Mariscal", el solo de violin y musica ligera "Encanto y veneracion" y el cuarteto femenino "No sabemos a nadie sino a Usted".
					
					Las ejecutantes alabaron las hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien dedico hasta el ultimo momento de su vida a llevar a la realidad el ideal y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					Tambien cantaron en tono patetico que nuestra patria prosperara para siempre como la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il bajo sabia direccion del Comandante Supremo quien glorifica a todo el mundo la dignidad e impetu de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					La funcion fue objeto de efusivos aplausos por parte del publico por haber mostrado un mundo artistico tan maravilloso con la vigorosa musica vocal, originales y entusiastas musicas instrumentales, elegante concordancia y hermosas melodias que reflejan el espiritu de la epoca.
					
					El Mariscal felicito el exito de la funcion respondiendo con la mano alzada a las efusivas aclamaciones de los espectadores y las ejecutantes.
					
					Le acompanaron en verla Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Kim Myong Sik, Pak Thae Su, Kim Yong Chol, Jo Kyong Chol y Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con ministro de Industria y Agricultura de Mongolia y su comitiva
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con ministro de Industria y Agricultura de Mongolia y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 2 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el ministro de Industria y Agricultura de Mongolia y presidente de la parte mongolesa del Comite Consultivo Intergubernamental de Economia, Comercio, Ciencia y Tecnica RPDC-Mongolia, Khaltmaa Battulga, y su comitiva que le hicieron una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe presente de ministro de Industria y Agricultura de Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe presente de ministro de Industria y Agricultura de Mongolia
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio presente que le dirigiera el ministro de Industria y Agricultura y presidente de la parte mongolesa del Comite Consultivo Intergubernamental de Economia, Comercio, Ciencia y Tecnica RPDC-Mongolia, Khaltmaa Battulga, de visita en Corea.
					El visitante lo entrego el dia 2 al presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, Kim Yong Nam.

articles.title: Rubricadas notas de entendimiento entre RPDC y Mongolia
articles.content:
Rubricadas notas de entendimiento entre RPDC y Mongolia 
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo firmada este miercoles en esta capital la nota de entendimiento sobre la institucion de la Compania Conjunta de Amistad Corea-Mongolia entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Mongolia. 
					En la ceremonia de firmas participaron por la parte coreana el ministro de Comercio Exterior y presidente de la parte coreana del Comite Consultivo Intergubernamental de Economia, Comercio, Ciencia y Tecnica RPDC-Mongolia, Ri Ryong Nam, el viceministro de Agricultura y presidente del comite de administracion ganadera de la zona de Sepho, Hwang Min y otros funcionarios, y por la mongolesa, el ministro de Industria y Agricultura y presidente de la parte mongolesa del comite mencionado, Khaltmaa Battulga y su comitiva, el embajador Manibadrakh Ganbold y otros miembros de la  sede diplomatica de Mongolia en Corea.
					
					Ademas fue suscrita la nota de entendimiento entre el Ministerio de Comercio Exterior de la RPDC y el Ministerio del Trabajo de Mongolia.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre granjas cooperativas de provincia de Hwanghae del Sur
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre granjas cooperativas de provincia de Hwanghae del Sur
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno como marchan las faenas agricolas en las granjas cooperativas de los distritos de Yonan, Chongdan y Paechon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur.
					Pasando revista a las granjas, estimulo a los agricultores que se esfuerzan por lograr alto rendimiento.
					
					En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno se hizo enfasis en alcanzar a toda costa la meta de produccion de cereales de este ano presentada por el Partido al elevar incesantemente el nivel cientifico y el de modernizacion de la agricultura e introducir eficazmente los avanzadas metodos agricolas.
					
					Se discutieron los problemas para exigir a las unidades vinculadas el suministro a tiempo de las materias primas y materiales necesarios a la agricultura.
					
					Por otra parte, el premier recorrio el campo de construccion del 2o edificio del Aeropuerto de Pyongyang donde tomo medidas para garantizar la calidad y velocidad de la obra.
